parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The sudden and unexpected cracking or shattering of the windshield can cause impaired visibility, increase the risk of accidents, and lead to costly repairs.
symptoms: Windshield cracks or shatters without any apparent reason
cracks appear suddenly while driving or when the vehicle is parked
cracks grow rapidly
and windshields are prone to shattering even with minor impacts.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The sudden and unexplained cracking of the windshield can impair visibility, causing a safety hazard while driving, and potentially lead to accidents.
symptoms: Windshield cracks suddenly
often with no apparent cause
and can spread rapidly; cracks may start from the edge of the windshield and move towards the center; windshields may crack even with minimal impact from small debris.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The sudden and uncontrolled acceleration of the vehicle can cause loss of control, leading to accidents, injuries, and fatalities.
symptoms: Vehicle surges forward rapidly
often without warning
and may lose control; brake pedal may not respond or may be ineffective; vehicle may jump curbs or crash into obstacles.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: Rodent damage to wiring can cause electrical system failures, leading to safety hazards, and potentially result in accidents or injuries.
symptoms: Rodents (mice) are attracted to soy-based wiring and create nests within the vehicle
causing damage to electrical systems; may result in costly repairs and downtime.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The defective headlight design can cause reduced visibility, distractions, and potentially lead to accidents, especially at night or in low-light conditions.
symptoms: Low beam headlights have a distinct cut-off between light and dark
creating a "shade" effect; dark spots or shadows appear near the edge of the light beam
especially on the left side; the light beam does not shine far enough down the road; the shadows can be distracting and may cause the driver to swerve or react as if there is an obstacle on the road.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The poor design and placement of the rear turn signals can reduce visibility, potentially leading to accidents or near-misses, especially when changing lanes or turning.
symptoms: Rear turn signals are small
dim
and mounted low on the rear bumper
making them difficult to see for following vehicles; signals can be easily obscured by snow or other debris; the side view mirror turn signals are also small and have poor visibility.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The delay in receiving the necessary parts for the exterior lighting recall can prolong the risk of accidents or other safety issues related to the defective headlights.
symptoms: Notification of NHTSA Campaign Number: 22V033000 (Exterior Lighting) has been received
but the necessary parts are unavailable; the manufacturer has exceeded a reasonable amount of time for the recall repair.
